import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{thunk}from"redux-thunk";import{persistStore,persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import rootReducer from"./reducer/rootReducer";// import { RootState } from "./reducer/rootReducer";
const persistConfig={key:"root",storage,whitelist:["user"]};const persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);export const store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer,middleware:getDefaultMiddleware=>getDefaultMiddleware().concat(thunk)});export const persistor=persistStore(store);
